msContents.summary: This is a paper manuscript of third kāṇḍa of the Vākyapadīya with the commentary by Helārāja. It was acquired by Franz Kielhorn in 1881 for the Government of Bombay. The text extends from the beginning until a few lines into the commentary on verse 51 (counted as 67 in this manuscript) of the Sādhanasamuddeśa. It is strongly correlated with the manuscript from the Bhau Dāji Memorial, which suggests that they descend from the same archetype. This transcription was made from a black and white facsimile.
